languages.text: {n}Даже искуснейшему из богохульных ксеносов не под силу расколоть душу слуги Его. Гемункул ведет игру разума с Кибеллой, он убедил ее, что его марионетки — частицы ее самой. Но это лишь искусный обман.{/n}

{n}Not even the most skilful among the blasphemous xenos can fracture the soul of one of His servants. The Haemonculus is playing a mind game with Kibellah by convincing her that his puppets are all parts of her. In truth, it is merely an intricate deception.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Даже искуснейшему из богохульных ксеносов не под силу расколоть душу слуги Его. Гемункул ведет игру разума с Кибеллой, он убедил ее, что его марионетки — частицы ее самой. Но это лишь искусный обман.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Not even the most skilful among the blasphemous xenos can fracture the soul of one of His servants. The Haemonculus is playing a mind game with Kibellah by having convinced her that his puppets are all parts of her. In truth, it is merely an intricate deception.{/n}

{n}Not even the most skilful among the blasphemous xenos can fracture the soul of one of His servants. The Haemonculus is playing a mind game with Kibellah by having convinced her that his puppets are all parts of her. In truth, it is merely an intricate deception.{/n}

{n}Not even the most skilful among the blasphemous xenos can fracture the soul of one of His servants. The Haemonculus is playing a mind game with Kibellah by convincing her that his puppets are all parts of her. In truth, it is merely an intricate deception.{/n}

"An impossible blasphemy!" {n}Cold fury rings in her voice.{/n} "The dark fleshcarver has trampled upon the true way, Enim'{name}. I... we fought to the death, we forced them to cut our thread short, but he wrested us from the Undying One's hands. Made us into an abomination. I yearn to purge this place, but what can I do against a foe who wields the heresy of immortality?"

{n}Not even the most skilful among the blasphemous xenos can fracture the soul of one of His servants. The Haemonculus is playing a mind game with Kibellah by convincing her that his puppets are all parts of her. In truth, it is merely an intricate deception.{/n}

{n}Not even the most skilful among the blasphemous xenos can fracture the soul of one of His servants. The Haemonculus is playing a mind game with Kibellah by convincing her that his puppets are all parts of her. In truth, it is merely an intricate deception.{/n}

{n}Not even the most skilful among the blasphemous xenos can fracture the soul of one of His servants. The Haemonculus is playing a mind game with Kibellah by convincing her that his puppets are all parts of her. In truth, it is merely an intricate deception.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ni el más hábil de los blasfemos xenos puede fracturar el alma de uno de Sus sirvientes. El Hemónculo está jugando con la mente de Kibellah, intentando convencerla de que sus marionetas son parte de ella. En realidad, no es más que un engaño elaborado.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Not even the most skilful among the blasphemous xenos can fracture the soul of one of His servants. The Haemonculus is playing a mind game with Kibellah by convincing her that his puppets are all parts of her. In truth, it is merely an intricate deception.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ni el más hábil de los blasfemos xenos puede fracturar el alma de uno de Sus sirvientes. El Hemónculo está jugando con la mente de Kibellah, intentando convencerla de que sus marionetas son parte de ella. En realidad, no es más que un engaño elaborado.{/n}

languages.text: {n}冒涜的な異種族の中で最も巧妙な者であっても、主に仕える者の魂を砕くことはできない。ハモンキュラスはキベラへと、自分の操り人形はすべて、彼女の一部であると信じ込ませることで、彼女をもてあそんでいるのだ。実際は、複雑に絡み合った欺瞞にすぎない。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Not even the most skilful among the blasphemous xenos can fracture the soul of one of His servants. The Haemonculus is playing a mind game with Kibellah by convincing her that his puppets are all parts of her. In truth, it is merely an intricate deception.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}冒涜的な異種族の中で最も巧妙な者であっても、主に仕える者の魂を砕くことはできない。ハモンキュラスはキベラへと、自分の操り人形はすべて、彼女の一部であると信じ込ませることで、彼女をもてあそんでいるのだ。実際は、複雑に絡み合った欺瞞にすぎない。{/n}

languages.text: {n}哪怕是最狡诈的异形，也无法破坏帝皇忠仆的灵魂。血伶人在误导绮贝菈，让她误以为他制造出来的冒牌货都是她的一部分，但事实上，这仅仅是个复杂的骗局而已。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Not even the most skilful among the blasphemous xenos can fracture the soul of one of His servants. The Haemonculus is playing a mind game with Kibellah by convincing her that his puppets are all parts of her. In truth, it is merely an intricate deception.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}哪怕是最狡诈的异形，也无法破坏帝皇忠仆的灵魂。血伶人在误导绮贝菈，让她误以为他制造出来的冒牌货都是她的一部分，但事实上，这仅仅是个复杂的骗局而已。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Selbst die Geschicktesten unter den blasphemischen Xenos können die Seele einer Seiner Dienerinnen nicht brechen. Der Haemonculus spielt ein Gedankenspiel mit Kibellah, indem er sie überzeugt, dass seine Puppen alle ein Teil von ihr sind. Tatsächlich ist alles nur eine geschickte Täuschung.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Not even the most skilful among the blasphemous xenos can fracture the soul of one of His servants. The Haemonculus is playing a mind game with Kibellah by convincing her that his puppets are all parts of her. In truth, it is merely an intricate deception.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Selbst die Geschicktesten unter den blasphemischen Xenos können die Seele einer Seiner Dienerinnen nicht brechen. Der Haemonculus spielt ein Gedankenspiel mit Kibellah, indem er sie überzeugt, dass seine Puppen alle ein Teil von ihr sind. Tatsächlich ist alles nur eine geschickte Täuschung.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Pas même les plus habiles des xénos hérétiques ne peuvent fracturer l'âme de Ses serviteurs. L'hémoncule cherche à manipuler Kibellah en lui faisant croire que ses pantins sont tous des fragments de sa propre personne, mais en réalité, ce n'est qu'un subterfuge particulièrement sophistiqué.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Not even the most skilful among the blasphemous xenos can fracture the soul of one of His servants. The Haemonculus is playing a mind game with Kibellah by convincing her that his puppets are all parts of her. In truth, it is merely an intricate deception.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Pas même les plus habiles des xénos hérétiques ne peuvent fracturer l'âme de Ses serviteurs. L'hémoncule cherche à manipuler Kibellah en lui faisant croire que ses pantins sont tous des fragments de sa propre personne, mais en réalité, ce n'est qu'un subterfuge particulièrement sophistiqué.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Dine aykırı zenoların en kabiliyetlisi bile O'nun hizmetkârlarından birinin ruhunu parçalayamaz. Haimonkulus, bu kuklaların onun bir parçası olduğu konusunda Kibellah'yı ikna ederek onunla oyun oynuyor. İşin gerçeği, bu yalnızca detaylı bir aldatmaca.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Not even the most skilful among the blasphemous xenos can fracture the soul of one of His servants. The Haemonculus is playing a mind game with Kibellah by convincing her that his puppets are all parts of her. In truth, it is merely an intricate deception.{/n}
